description.p: Returns a list of installed ODBC drivers.

discussion.p: The *[xb:ListDrivers()]* method returns a list of installed ODBC drivers.

page.example:
dim cn as sql::connection cn.setConnectionString("{a5api=odbc}") DriverList = cn.ListDrivers()
